div.p: Replication: On the Ecological Validity of Online Security Developer
Anastasia Danilova , Alena Naiakshina , Johanna Deuter, Matthew Smith
Naiakshina et al. [CHI19] conducted a study on password storage
Study was not announced as an academic study but as a real project
Examining deception in the study context: We announced the study as an
Recruitment Selected Freelancers Freelancers applied for the study
Takeaways Study with deception in study context and our replication with announcement
yielded same significant effects and directions
Only one data point - more studies necessary
